Text.Page:
Word of your accomplishments reached Velika some time ago, and rumors of your exploits have been spreading like wildfire ever since. That's why we called you here.

The Hands of Velika is a merchant group like no other. You see, in times like these, the Hands feel that upstanding members of society who wish to live to a ripe old age must wear many hats.

Velika's big and there's lots that needs doing during war times.

Your talents would be paramount to our causeâ€”which is also your cause, .

Will you help us?
Thank you for your help! Hope you won't forget us when we need you again!
